overview: Jeanette is a Social Media Strategist and Principal of “ted-paulson digital agency” with offices in Germany, Australia and the US. She has extensive knowledge in crafting brand strategies and bringing them onto the digital landscape and into the global marketplace while uniquely positioning them. Jeanette is a champion and an independent thought leader on social and emerging technologies, with a track record of crafting successful digital brand strategies and implementing effective social media initiatives. She specializes in content development and partnerships, programming, operations, branding and identity, brand management and extensions, business and strategic planning, product development, strategic partnerships, corporate communications, promotions, product philosophy adjustments to new markets.
